text:
Chapter 1:
The Man, Possessed by Desire

By the Sumida River in Asakusa, a temple that
turned into an 'Otherworld' long ago remains standing.
The Shoryuonji of Penglai― A fake temple created by youkai.

Normally, it is strictly sealed and inaccessible to anyone, but for a few
days at the end of the year, only 'App' users are permitted entry.

During these limited dates, a winter event is held jointly on the pilgrimage path
by three regions that love festivals: Asakusa, Shibamata, and Kabukicho. That is―

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Yes, it is the tradition of the 'Fighting Festival' and
its raging floats, the pride of us fierce members of Asakusa!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
A passionate winter festival where we clash our youth through
multiple heated programs and compete for the overall victory...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
This year's victory will surely be seized
by us of the Asakusa Team― the Asokenkai!!

name: Taishakuten
text:
Hah, look at you acting like the festival host.
The only reason it's being held in Asakusa is
simply because of the location, you know?

name: Taishakuten
text:
I don't like the fact that the place is a knock-off temple either...
Anyway, this year we're taking the win!

name: Taishakuten
text:
Burning with the profiting spirit essential for any festival―
Are us, members of the Shibamata Team, the Teijashu!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihihi, that's not gonna happen~?
Whether it's the yankees from Asakusa or the teamers
from Shibamata, it's all just playing house in the end!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle and his crew, a group of real outlaws, will
teach you what real terror― What true 'menace' really is!

name: Y'golonac
text:
So, winning is only certain for Uncle and these badass
members of the Kabukicho Team― the Kichorabu!!
鬼蝶羅舞 (kichorabu): phonetic pun on 'Kicho Love' using 'yankee' ateji kanji styles

The heads of each region participating in the festival spark against each other.
That heat immediately spread to the vice-heads and members.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Fufu. 'Playing house', you say, Y'golonac. This is a temple of youkai,
so there are no blind spots for the Asakusa Team where I serve as vice-head, you know?

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Besides, our roster is full of idiots who give their all to
trouble every single day. There's no reason for us to lose, right, Licho?

name: Licho
text:
Of course, General― No, Vice-Head!! After all, Umamichi is a group
of real yankees who's always ready for a scrap!

name: Licho
text:
Plus, a ton of my buddies are gonna rush here later as reinforcements, you know?
It's plain as day that we'll take the win by a mile, so get ready, you punks!

name: Nobuharu
text:
I'm fully aware that everyone else is tough...
But Shibamata won't lose when it comes to fighting spirit!

name: Nobuharu
text:
I'm still inexperienced, but I plan to give
it my all both as vice-head and as a cheerleader!

name: Nobuharu
text:
Besides, this year we have a steady stream of helpers joining us
from Shinjuku, including the students from Suidocho Business Academy!

name: Thunderbird
text:
When you're asked for help, you have no choice but to answer.
If it's a request from a junior who always takes care of me, even more so.

name: Suzuka
text:
Wait, shouldn't you be on Kabukicho's side, Thunderbird!?
...I'd like to say that, but I guess it can't be helped if it's Nobuharu's request.

name: Suzuka
text:
But still, you've really grown to be acting as vice-head, Nobuharu.
That just means you're on equal footing with me, so don't expect me to go easy on you!

name: Gyobu
text:
Haha, these folks are deeply indebted to the young master's family.
It's only natural that they can't say no.

name: Gyobu
text:
Though while we are at it, as a humble faculty member of Suidocho,
I'm looking forward to seeing my cute student in action.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle won't forgive you, Thunderbird! Now that you've
become an enemy, I'll ruthlessly bring you down from your high horse, hihihi!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Don't think I'll go easy on you just because we sit together in the
night division for working adults in Suidocho's business department!?

name: Taishakuten
text:
C'mon, quit whining about your private grudges!
This Fighting Festival is all about having a refreshing battle!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Indeed, let us clash our heated youth to our hearts' content!
And― I shall push you all to even further heights!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Ugh... So stuffy in this dead of winter.
People are supposed to be depraved,
so what is the Asakusa Head even talking about?

Each camp, unable to suppress its overflowing fighting spirit, was already raising its
voltage in anticipation and excitement for the upcoming Yoimiya eve-festival.

At the same time, combined with a dangerous tension that a brawl might
break out at any moment... They were all keeping each other in check.

In order to blend into this anything-but-peaceful festival mood,
two police officers are here, dressed lightly in festival attire―

options.text: A festival for the delinquent groups (?).
It already looks fun with all this tension!
I-It's so cold...!!

name: Jagannath
text:
Hehehe, nice! Things are already heating
up even before the eve-festival even starts!

name: Jagannath
text:
Should we give ourselves a team name too?
A slightly bad police duo― How does Sogikanzoku sound?
双義官賊 (sogikanzoku): roughly translated into 'justice official bandits'

name: Jagannath
text:
As expected, festivals really get your spirits up!
Hey, since it's a winter festival, there are plenty of hot food stalls being prepared too!?

options.text: We're not here to play, you know!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I know that, we're strictly here for investigation.
...Wait, look at that fried food stall, it looks delicious!

options.text: Let's calm down a bit, Jagannath.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You say that, but you're actually quite into it yourself.
Just cut loose, your senior officer gives you permission!

options.text: Should we just enjoy ourselves for a bit!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's the spirit I'd expect from my partner candidate!
Switching gears is essential for these things...
Alright, let's go!

text:
―As the excited [Player] duo made a fuss,
the gazes of the people gathered there finally turned toward the two.

name: Tetsuox
text:
Hmm? Well, if it isn't you, Jagannath. And even you too, Boss!
Did you come to the festival to play?

name: Tetsuya
text:
Hey, have you already forgotten, Tetsuox?
[Player] is currently part of the police.

name: Tetsuya
text:
There's no way they'd just come to play for no reason...
...No, it might be possible with these two?

name: Jagannath
text:
Yo, the Tetsu-Tetsu combo.
You two really haven't changed a bit, heheh.

name: Tetsuya
text:
Don't go grouping us together with a nickname!
Tsk... And which of us 'hasn't changed', you two-timer?

name: Y'golonac
text:
K-Kwaaaaaaah!
The main culprit behind this whole transfer incident has appeared!

name: Y'golonac
text:
A henchman of the 'Evil Organization' trying to
forcibly separate Uncle and [Player], whose destiny is bound!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Your scheme is transparent, but I won't let it happen...
Uncle'll never hand [Player] over to you!!

options.text: That makes me a little bit happy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Did you see that!? [Player] does love Uncle!
There's no room for someone like you to squeeze in, stupid idiot!

options.text: Fuffuffu, feel free to be as lonely as you want!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Are you still mad that Uncle left his smelly socks out?
I'll apologize properly, so please come back!

options.text: ...Please stop that, it's embarrassing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Just wait, I'll chase this guy away now! Shoo-shoo.
Go away if you don't want Uncle to throw his smelly socks at you!

name: Jagannath
text:
For the record, I never intended on forcing them into the police.
I'm fine with wherever [Player] decides to go.

name: Jagannath
text:
Though, whichever they choose,
I'll be able to handle it, wahahaha!

name: Jagannath
text:
They might fall for my 'One-Two' charm and refuse to leave me,
but when that happens, make sure to accept it, dear Papa?

name: Y'golonac
text:
―D-Do not call me Papa!!
I won't let you arbitrarily narrow down our infinite possibilities!

name: Y'golonac
text:
And besides, why is the police at the Fighting Festival!?
It's a tradition to not intervene unless there's a serious problem.

options.text: R-Really...!?
No, I'm not falling for anyone.
No, there are no infinite possibilities.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Ha! Don't tell me you're trying to
teach [Player] bad habits...? That's Uncle's job!

name: Y'golonac
text:
As long as Uncle's eyes are open, I won't allow you to take
them away from the festival and into a thicket somewhere!

As Y'golonac sputtered and ran wild with jealousy,
a person who had been restless within the Shibamata Team rushed over.

name: Ryota
text:
[Player]!! It's been so long since yesterday!
Ahh, I'm so glad you're looking well!

name: Ryota
text:
...Well, sorry for interrupting your conversation.
But, I just couldn't wait any longer!

name: Jinn
text:
―Oh, is this my chance to join in!?
Hahaha, I've come along as well, [Player]!

name: Jinn
text:
You must be freezing in those clothes, right?
Come on, you can warm yourself with me right now!

name: Jinn
text:
I'm usually avoided during summer festivals much to my chagrin,
but at this winter festival, there's no problem no matter how hot I burn!!

options.text: Ryota, Jinn-sensei, it is you two after all.
I was wondering when I could talk to you too.
Why are you two at the Fighting Festival?

text:
The two looked at each other,
and Ryota began to explain a bit sheepishly.

name: Yule
text:
Long time no see, Ryota! What's up?
―Eh, you're worried about [Player]?

name: Yule
text:
[Player] was just here until...
Ah, no. Sorry! It's nothing!

name: Ryota
text:
Did... [Player] come to you?
That means there was an incident at the Santa School!?

name: Ryota
text:
That reaction― I knew it.
[Player], you're already involved in some incident...

name: Ryota
text:
...Hey, by any chance, does info on the
investigation reach the Santa School too?

name: Yule
text:
―! Wait, Ryota. I'm the one who let it slip,
but I can't just talk about that on my own...

name: Ryota
text:
Please, Yule!
I'd never want to trouble you, but―

name: Ryota
text:
But this is more important than anything to me right now.
I'm so worried about [Player]!

name: Ryota
text:
So I couldn't hold back and rushed here with Jinn-sensei.
Sorry, we don't intend to interfere with the investigation at all.

name: Jinn
text:
Well, basically... That's how it is!
And so, we asked to join the festival at the last minute.

name: Jinn
text:
I asked Motosumi-sensei to join the Asakusa Team,
and Ryota asked Taishakuten to join the Shibamata Team.

name: Jinn
text:
Of course, I have no intention of getting
in your way, but... We were just worried about you.

options.text: (Give the two of them a hug)
I have a good friend, and a good teacher.
I'm not that fragile.

name: Jinn
text:
Y-You idiot! It's only natural for a
teacher to care about his student's safety!

name: Jinn
text:
Besides, that wasn't the only reason we came.
Of course we were worried about the police investigation being dangerous, but―

name: Ryota
text:
Whether you'll actually return to Shinjuku Academy―
That's what we're particularly concerned about.

name: Ryota
text:
...Toji being gone is
honestly a huge deal for me.

name: Ryota
text:
To be honest, I took it for granted that we'd
be together forever. Or at least until we graduate.

name: Ryota
text:
I want to respect Toji's choice, and I'm rooting for him.
But, if you were to leave me too...

note: this is the type of shit you'd hear at main story, not at a random Christmas event...?

options.text: I won't leave you be.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Thank you.
I knew you'd say that because you're kind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But... Things won't stay this way forever.
I actually know that too.

options.text: We can't be together forever.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Yeah. Things won't stay this way forever.
I thought I understood that, but now that I finally realize it...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But... That's why I want to prolong this time as much as possible.
I want to cherish it.

options.text: (Make a troubled face)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sorry, I'm troubling you as well as Yule.
But I'm just... lonely without you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Things won't stay this way forever.
I know that, but...

name: Y'golonac
text:
(...Oh no. My chest suddenly felt tight.
Hey, is it the same for me and [Player]?)

name: Y'golonac
text:
(Even though we're together like this, and it's normal
right now, will this 'normal' disappear someday...?)

Y'golonac almost drifted off into sentimentality,
but he quickly shook his head and pulled himself together.

name: Y'golonac
text:
(...Now's not the time to get all emotional!!
What's important is that those kids and Uncle are 'comrades'!)

name: Y'golonac
text:
(In that case, the three of us should secretly conspire
to not let Jagannath take [Player] away... Hihihi!)

name: Motosumi
text:
...Uh, sorry for interrupting.
You are [Player] and― Jagannath, was it?

name: Jagannath
text:
Yeah, I'm Jagannath, the reliable local policeman.
Nice to meet you, yankee-dad of Godoji.

name: Motosumi
text:
Guh, just how did you know about that!?
Well, we've heard your name too, Mister Delinquent Cop.

name: Motosumi
text:
Setting that aside. From what Ryota said,
are you two here to investigate some incident?

name: Motosumi
text:
Sure, rough crowds gather at the Fighting Festival,
but so far it's been perfectly peaceful despite the tension.

name: Motosumi
text:
―Or could it be something else?
Is the culprit of some incident hiding in this festival?

And, just after the sharp gazes of the festival
factions concentrated on the two police officers...

―Forgive me for interrupting while you are busy.
Might I have a moment?

Everyone turned at the sound of the unexpectedly alluring voice.
The person who appeared there was―

options.text: Wow, a wonderful person with everything 'big'.
What― Tachihara Kirito!?
Mysterious kids!?

name: Baphomet
text:
Oh, how embarrassing.
To have such words and gazes directed at me simultaneously...

name: Baphomet
text:
But, well. I suppose it cannot be helped.
After all, that is just the 'kind of being' I am―

name: Kirito
text:
...Haah. If I knew you'd be here,
I wouldn't have come.

name: Kirito
text:
You still have that same peaceful look on your face...
I envy you, [Player]-san.

Kirito glanced at his old acquaintance and
immediately fixed his eyes on Jagannath.

name: Kirito
text:
...Isn't that person a somewhat famous police officer?
Does that mean [Player]-san's a 'cop' too?

options.text: Only for a limited time.
I wanted to show you my uniform.
Would that be a problem?

name: Color Gang
text:
―Wait, what? Kirito has an acquaintance who's a cop?
I mean, they don't really look like one...

name: Color Gang
text:
But, doesn't that black tiger cop next to them look kinda dangerous?
Hey, don't get scared and wimp out...!!

Behind Kirito, a group of deliquent boys whispered to each other.
Watching them, Jagannath's face broke into a big grin.

name: Jagannath
text:
Haha, so some typical bad brats have appeared?
Fine by me, this looks like it'll be fun.

name: Color Gang
text:
D-Don't talk to us like you know us, cop! We hate the police,
especially ones like you who just act all high and mighty!

name: Color Gang
text:
And besides, why is there a cop at the Fighting Festival?
We heard we could let loose here. This isn't what we were told.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh! Come on, don't say that.
It's a festival, so let's enjoy it together, okay?

name: Color Gang
text:
Hah? What's with this guy...?
Just go home already, cop!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Yeah, tell him, tell him~!
Cops who don't belong here should go home~!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Ah―
[Player], except for you, of course!?

options.text: Hmph, so that's how it is.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Just kidding! Did you think I meant it?
That's the kind of joke only Uncle and Jagan can share!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, look who's talking?
Well, we do share some 'bad' memories. Hehe!

options.text: Jagannath, you can punch him.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uwahh, no violence! Not the face!
Uncle's face's fans won't stay silent if you do!

options.text: Don't bully Jagan-oniichan!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uncle'll never accept this guy to be a son!
Wait, wouldn't that automatically make me your Papa?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, I wouldn't mind being your son.
I'll make sure to be very 'filial', so do look forward to it!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Hmm... It's getting noisy one after another.
Though, I suppose that's what a festival is like.

name: Taishakuten
text:
No, even so, this is too much of a mess!
The festival is just beginning, but this is way past a full house.

The place became rowdy with the delinquents' boos,
but the voice of a Transient with large goat horns silenced them.

name: Baphomet
text:
―Children, could you please be quiet?
You have not forgotten why we came here, have you?

name: Baphomet
text:
You are in a position to 'ask for a favor',
so you can behave yourselves for a little while, can you not?

Seeing the delinquents fall silent,
the Transient flashed a beautiful smile.

name: Baphomet
text:
Everyone, my apologies.
I am Baphomet, a school counselor.

name: Baphomet
text:
Due to circumstances, I have left the academy and am now serving as a guardian―
Or rather, 'something like' a guardian for these children.

name: Jinn
text:
―!
Are you Baphomet-sensei!?

name: Jinn
text:
I've heard the rumors about you.
You're famous as an excellent therapist traveling around the academies in Tokyo.

name: Jinn
text:
If I recall... You can interfere with the 'devil in the heart'
and make it smaller or something like that...?

name: Baphomet
text:
...Strictly speaking, I am not a 'teacher'?
But, yes. That is how I work― 'Basically'.

name: Jinn
text:
But, you mentioned being a 'guardian'?
That means those students there...

Seeing Jinn's worried expression,
Baphomet showed a genuine smile for just an instant.

name: Baphomet
text:
Yes, they are not currently affiliated with any academy.
And― that is precisely why we have visited this place.

name: Baphomet
text:
You see, this festival has a well-balanced mix of
culture-festival-like and sports-festival-like events, does it not?

options.text: So that's the kind of event this is.
A 'Fighting Festival' has culture festival elements...?
It suddenly sounds like a wholesome festival!

name: Baphomet
text:
A 'pseudo-school-festival' for these children with
too much energy. That is my wish as a school counselor.

name: Baphomet
text:
They are not the type of children who like these kinds of events, but fortunately,
they showed interest only in the 'Fighting Festival' known for its rough nature, fufu.

name: Baphomet
text:
So if you would not mind, I would like to have them
participate as a fourth faction― Would that be allowed?

Receiving Baphomet's proposal, the heads of
each team quickly exchanged glances.

name: Taishakuten
text:
―Well, that should be fine, right?
Honestly, I thought it was a touching story. I welcome them!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Indeed, if they have the motivation, there's no reason to refuse.
Their spirit to aim for the top in this Fighting Festival is commendable!

name: Y'golonac
text:
I agree, this is also a way to help people, right?
Kabukicho is a city of duty and humanity, so of course you're welcome!

name: Y'golonac
text:
(Hihihi, that's not a lie,
but these hot-blooded delinquents...)

name: Y'golonac
text:
(Look like they could be useful for chasing away Jagan!?
Uncle is so sharp today~~!?)

options.text: Eh, that easy!?
Yankees are so generous...
Y'golonac is being a bit suspicious, though.

name: Jagannath
text:
Haha! This is it.
This is why I can't get enough of yankees!

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Kaka! I do agree to that.
Because, we've got plenty of refreshingly pleasant idiots!

name: Suzuka
text:
...Good grief, I guess it can't be helped.
Should we even think about adjusting the programs?

name: Nobuharu
text:
It's true that the more the merrier!
But... which region will you be representing?

name: Kirito
text:
Where... If you ask that, I guess we'd be Ikebukuro?
These are the stray dogs of underground Ikebukuro who
gathered around me because they had nothing better to do―

name: Kirito
text:
Baphomet-san, who visited there, unified them...
Rather, her being 'put on a pedestal' was the catalyst for this group.

name: Y'golonac
text:
―'Put on a pedestal'?
Wait, does that mean you're a small-scale religious group?

name: Baphomet
text:
...
No, we are...

options.text: By the way...
If it's underground Ikebukuro...
Is this the color gang from the rumors!?

name: Jagannath
text:
Hey, did you only realize just now?
I can't tell if you're slow or sharp.

name: Kirito
text:
Well, that is what we are called.
The revival, second coming or something of the color gang?

name: Kirito
text:
When Oniwaka-san disappeared, it was just a matter of someone taking the empty spot.
We're completely different from the previous color gang, though.

name: Kirito
text:
...But, haha. To think that Oniwaka-san of all
people would actually start attending an academy.

options.text: Right― Which academy is Oniwaka attending?
Is it Bukuro Academy after all?
No one ever told me anything!?

name: Kirito
text:
...Ah, am I allowed to say? Well, whatever.
It'll be more interesting if I tell you.

name: Kirito
text:
...Heh, it almost sounds like a joke.
Oniwaka-san, a stray Transient, at an academy.

name: Kirito
text:
Say― Where are you going?
Not that I'm particularly interested.

name: Oniwaka
text:
............
Ameyoko Fashion Academy.

name: Kirito
text:
...Ah, um. Sorry. If I didn't mishear―
Did you just say Ameyoko?

name: Oniwaka
text:
...There was something I've
wanted to make for a long time.

name: Oniwaka
text:
Something with a softness that returns my hard fists to the hands of a baby,
a mass of warmth that could heal any old wound― That's what.

name: Kirito
text:
...I see. I don't really get it,
but basically you found a place like that?

name: Kirito
text:
Congratulations―
I suppose I should say that much.

name: Baphomet
text:
In any case, I would like to offer my heartfelt thanks
for accepting us so readily, our dear hosts.

name: Baphomet
text:
Well then, we shall be participating from tomorrow.
For today, we shall take our leave―

Just as Baphomet was about to turn back,
Jagannath suddenly shouted in an out-of-place loud voice.

name: Jagannath
text:
―Alright then, I guess it's about
time for us to start our job too!

name: Jagannath
text:
What do you think, should we start with a light jab?
What's your take, [Player]?

name: Y'golonac
text:
What are you shouting so suddenly for!
We just settled things, didn't we?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Can't you read the room?
It's all over for you if you're being pointed out by Uncle!

Ignoring those words and without even waiting for [Player]'s reply,
Jagannath intentionally spoke without reading the room.

name: Jagannath
text:
Actually. The reason we came here is because we got info that a group
who might be the culprits of a certain incident would be participating.

name: Jagannath
text:
Well, it's just our suspicion,
but we need to look into that group.

name: Motosumi
text:
So that was it after all.
―And, what is this incident you're talking about?

name: Ryota
text:
...Ah, right. If this is the
incident Yule was talking about―

The delinquent cop of the black tiger directed
his gaze at the color gang and paused for effect.

name: Jagannath
text: ―The Black Santa Attack Incident.

The delinquents' shoulders jumped.
Their agitation was obvious to anyone present.

options.text: T-That's not a light jab at all...!
What do we do with this atmosphere?
(Watch the situation silently)

text:
A short silence. Showing a hint of surprise,
Baphomet slowly looked back at the children.

name: Baphomet
text: ...Could it be.

The color gang won't meet her eyes.
Kirito laughed with a mix of exasperation and amusement.

name: Kirito
text:
Haha... I don't know who they are,
but there are idiots who'd pull something like that?

name: Baphomet
text:
...Children?
―Explain yourselves.

name: Baphomet
text:
I remember having told you beforehand.
That, by focusing on participating in the festival right now―

Her expression changed. From one like
a mother scolding her child, to hesitation.
And then― To a look of resolution.

Baphomet swallowed her words and
regained her originally composed attitude.

name: Baphomet
text:
...'Just a suspicion.'
That is what you said, dear police officer?

name: Jagannath
text:
Yeah, that's what I said?
We intend to look into it 'thoroughly'.

Under the clear winter sky, they lock eyes.
A few strange seconds pass, as if a silent conversation is taking place.

name: Color Gang Members
text:
...Baphomet.
Umm, we...

name: Baphomet
text:
I withdraw my request for an explanation.
You children should keep your mouths closed.

name: Baphomet
text:
Fufu... It's alright.
'There is no problem whatsoever.'

Directing an all-encompassing smile at the children,
she straightened up and faced Jagannath.

name: Baphomet
text:
...'If by any chance' these children are the culprits, it would
be due to my lack of supervision, would it not, dear police officer?

name: Baphomet
text:
In that case― I shall carry a feeling of apology in my heart.
Strictly as a hypothetical, of course.

name: Jagannath
text:
There's no need for apologies for a hypothetical.
And also, I'm Jagannath.

name: Jagannath
text:
And by the way, this is my
partner candidate, [Player]. Nice to meet you.

name: Baphomet
text:
Jagannath-sama, [Player]-sama...
Yes, it is my pleasure to meet you as well.

name: Baphomet
text:
―Now then. Children, leave this to me and
return to your 'base' with Kirito-sama for today.

name: Color Gang Members
text: But...

name: Baphomet
text:
―'Return.'
And, leave everything to me, alright?

Nodding, the delinquents left.
After watching them go, Baphomet muttered quietly.

name: Baphomet
text:
...You are a very unusual
police officer, Jagannath-sama.

name: Baphomet
text:
But... I do wonder why?
I am curious, for what could possibly be in your heart―

name: Baphomet
text:
―No, that is impolite in this situation.
This is a wretched habit of mine... Please do pardon me.

name: Jagannath
text:
Haha, you're quite
interesting yourself too?

name: Jagannath
text:
A person like you, who unifies these brats who look like
they'd be bad news if left alone, and provides a place for them.

name: Baphomet
text:
...I was 'put on a pedestal'.
As Kirito-sama mentioned earlier. And―

A cold wind blew, and the light in her eyes wavered slightly.
Quickly erasing that wavering, Baphomet raised the corners of her mouth.

name: Baphomet
text:
And besides, 'other than providing a place',
I have not been able to do 'anything at all', much to my shame?

Something was seeping through her words. Before its true nature could be grasped,
Baphomet took over the conversation with a dignified attitude.

name: Baphomet
text:
Everyone, sorry for the trouble.
Well then, I shall truly take my leave now―

name: Suzuka
text:
Please, wait a moment.
You're the head of the Ikebukuro Team, right?

name: Suzuka
text:
The heads and vice-heads are about to have their final meeting.
Sorry, but at the very least you need to participate.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
And there's also a program to perform a simple rehearsal.
We'll need you to show your face there, too.

name: Nobuharu
text:
We might ask you to help with some duties around the programs...
I'm sorry to burden you...

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Ah, and can we ask that Kirito boy to be the vice-head?
If that's possible, that would be much helpful!

name: Baphomet
text:
...Yes, of course.
I have understood everything.

name: Y'golonac
text:
U-Uncle isn't going!!
Suzuka, I entrust everything to you!

name: Y'golonac
text:
You can even be the head of Kabukicho!
I don't care one bit about positions right now!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Because― Leaving [Player] and Jagannath
like this is way too dangerous?!?

name: Suzuka
text:
...Honestly, do whatever you want!
Can't you do something about that overprotectiveness instead?

As the heads, including Baphomet, left the spot,
the slightly stiffened atmosphere finally loosened.

name: Ryota
text:
...Phew, that was tense!
Police investigations might actually be scary after all!?

name: Jinn
text:
But― This is quite different from
the police investigations I know.

name: Jinn
text:
Those students... They seem to have left the academy,
but there's no doubt in anyone's eyes that they're the culprits.

name: Jinn
text:
Yet that Jagannath fellow just let
them go as if he were missing his chance.

Jagannath stretched with a hum.
Whether this was action with intent, or just thoughtlessness―

options.text: Was it really okay to let them go?
What about the questioning for the incident?
Senior, are you neglecting your duty?

name: Jagannath
text:
Heh, I just said it,
I intend to look into it 'thoroughly'.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Wait, what's with that probing look?
Look, I have my own experience and a method derived from that experience.

name: Jagannath
text:
To repeat myself, I won't explain everything in words.
I'll have you learn that 'method' on the job!

name: Tetsuya
text:
...Tsk, good grief.
That bad habit of his is on full display.

name: Tetsuya
text:
―Well, that's exactly why he's
allowed to come and go in Kabukicho.

name: Tetsuox
text:
Umm... So what exactly was that
fuss with the kids just now?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Ughhh, that bastard Jagannath...
Acting all cool with that aloof attitude. So cool!

name: Y'golonac
text:
This is bad! At this rate, [Player] will be taken
in by the police or something! Uncle is in a huge pinch!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Gununu... If that's the case, I'll make you realize
firsthand how dangerous an organization the police really is!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Involving that stuffy vice-homeroom-teacher and the chubby classmate,
I'll protect my cute [Player] from the evil clutches of the police―!!

name: Jagannath
text:
Yo. Pops, two jumbo franks!
It's so damn cold, so give me some piping hot ones, heheh?

name: Ogre
text:
Oh? If it isn't the former brat Jagannath.
Even though you became a cop, you're as cool as ever.

name: Ogre
text:
The one next to you... Is that your junior?
Haha, you ended up with a tough senior, didn't you?

name: Ogre
text:
―Here you go.
It's really hot, so don't burn yourself!

options.text: Thank you very much.
Really, it's been a lot of work since day one...

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Jagannath puts [Player] in a headlock, delighted by his junior's light banter.
The shopkeeper laughs at the sight.

options.text: He's a very reliable senior, you know?

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Jagannath puts [Player] in a headlock, delighted by his junior's light banter.
The shopkeeper laughs at the sight.

name: Ogre
text:
Just for the record, don't go causing any strange scenes, okay?
Though it's funny saying that to you police guys, gahaha!

It's been about an hour since the color gang left.
Jagannath has been walking around the venue under the guise of patrolling.

It's not yet time for the eve-festival, but the venue is already overflowing with people
and filled with a heat that blows away the December cold.

While eating, Jagannath enjoyed chatting with the shopkeepers and talking
to the delinquent boys, who were clearly annoyed by him.

options.text: Is this really a patrol?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, yeah, of course it is.
A patrolman is someone who earns their keep by 'patrolling' on foot, y'know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You talk to people here and there.
That's how live information is gathered.

options.text: You're just completely playing around.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, looks like playing to you, right?
That's what's important.
Otherwise, the people here wouldn't even talk to you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Standing on the same level and talking as equals―
That's essential for gathering info, and for other things too.

options.text: (Take the lead and frolic around)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, just how helpless can you be!?
Don't make me give you actual junior guidance!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: Well, it'd be boring otherwise, and as a way of behaving in a festival investigation, it's actually the correct answer.

text:
Having said all that with a sharp look, Jagannath took a
bite of his large frank and turned around suddenly.

name: Jagannath
text:
...So, what's with you guys?
You've been sneaking around and following us from a distance.

name: Jinn, Y'golonac & Ryota
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">―G-Guh!

name: Y'golonac
text:
W-What! You found us!?
I thought we were blending into the underground darkness level of stealth.

options.text: You three have quite the presence after all.
Don't underestimate my senior!
Maybe you should learn to Sneak from the Santas?

name: Jagannath
text:
Hmph, you're up to no good again, aren't you?
You're always like that, Uncle Y'golonac.

name: Y'golonac
text:
W-W-What are you saying~? Uncle and his crew were
just enjoying the festival, you know? Beep-beep♪

name: Y'golonac
text:
The family, the vice-homeroom teacher, and [Player]'s classmate―
The three of us are just deepening our friendship.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Right? We're just doing that, we aren't planning
anything at all, are we? Jinn-cha― Jinn, Ryota~?

name: Jinn
text:
Eh, ah, yeah. O-Of course!
This is, um― A sort of Shinjuku Academy social gathering!

name: Ryota
text:
R-Right. We're just deepening our friendship,
we haven't joined in on any of Y'golonac-san's evil schemes!

And while Y'golonac and the others were
feigning innocence, about 30 minutes earlier―

name: Jinn
text: <p2 style="font-size: 130%">―What?

name: Ryota
text: <p2 style="font-size: 130%">―Eh?

name: Jinn & Ryota
text: <p2 style="font-size: 130%">Make [Player] face something scary!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Exactly! I'll make them realize how dangerous the police
really is so they won't even think about joining them!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Now, I don't mean to put them in that much danger.
I'm a very kind Old One, after all...

name: Y'golonac
text:
I'll just make them imagine a little bit.
Like, every day is super dangerous if you join the police... Sort of?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Then, Uncle'll hold the shivering
[Player] in his plump chest... Fufu.

name: Jinn
text:
H-However, as a teacher, I absolutely
cannot put my beloved student in danger...!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Just look at it from a long-term perspective.
Imagine what will happen if they join the police!

name: Y'golonac
text:
They're already prone to getting caught up in things,
and they'll stick their nose into anything!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Think of it as making them realize the police is enough for them now,
which will lead to keeping them away from future dangers!

name: Jinn
text:
Ugh, that's true!? No!!
But as a teacher, as a lamp genie...

name: Y'golonac
text:
Jinn-chan! Be honest with yourself!
Think about what you really want, hand on heart?

name: Y'golonac
text:
It's fine, if their determination is real, nothing will change,
and if it's wavering, it's a chance to reconsider.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Then, couldn't this action be seen
as fulfilling [Player]'s real wish!?

name: Jinn
text:
Hand on, heart...
(What's this? My chest feels weird when I listen to this man...)

name: Ryota
text:
Hmm... I understand what Y'golonac-san is saying, but...
Selecting the path is up to [Player] after all...

name: Ryota
text:
Anyway, I don't think I can pull off
acting like I have a secret motive!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
You have to steel your heart, Ryota!
This is for the sake of [Player]'s safety~!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Actually, with that big belly of yours, you can
handle two or three secret motives, Uncle's pretty sure!
this line made me cry

name: Ryota
text:
For the sake of [Player]'s safety...
(Huh, my feelings are getting a bit floaty...?)

name: Y'golonac
text:
Anyway, our interests perfectly align!
Are you okay with letting [Player] go like this!?

name: Ryota
text:
―U-Um, okay. I'll try having a
secret motive at this Fighting Festival!

name: Ryota
text:
So, I just have to be like Licho, right?
Umm... I'll give it my all, so 'Nice to meet ya'!

he's using よろしく (yoroshiku) written in yankee ateji kanji (夜路詩句),
in an attempt to sound like a delinquent

name: Jinn
text:
...U-Umu, I understand, Father.
If it is to prioritize [Player]'s will.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Alrightー!
Then it's settled!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
While that's fine and all...
Did you just call me 'Father' in the confusion?

name: Jinn
text:
Eh? No, but for a
student's parent―

name: Y'golonac
text:
I'm not exactly a parent, and no honorifics needed!
Anyway― Let's follow them!!

name: Ryota
text:
Umm... Anyway, we just happened to hit it off.
But, can we look around together?

name: Jinn
text:
Patrolling a festival is one of a teacher's jobs.
And, my presence makes it warm here, so it's perfect!

options.text: Sure, let's patrol together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Just as I expected from you, [Player]!
Uncle will buy you anything you ask for!

options.text: Sure, let's play together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Just as I expected from you, [Player]!
Uncle will buy you anything you ask for!

options.text: (Wait for Jagannath's decision)

name: Jagannath
text:
...Tsk, can't be helped.
But well, maybe it's better if we look like we're just a group playing around?

name: Jagannath
text:
Then let's switch gears and
continue the patrol in high spirits!

As Jagannath walks off whistling lightly,
Y'golonac chuckles behind him.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihihi, we got found out, but isn't the result fine?
If I just look for a chance to cause a bit of trouble―

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Though, what should I actually do?
Using my 'mark' here would cause too much of a mess.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hmm, if only there was a chance to cause just
the right amount of trouble, and a good way to do it―

As Y'golonac began to rack his brains at the back of the group,
a woman passing by caught sight of him.

name: Yaksha
text:
Oh? A handsome old guy with a dangerous charm...
Hey, hey, would you like to play with me?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hmm? Are you talking to Uncle?
You don't look like one of my babies, but...

name: Yaksha
text:
Ahaha, you called me your baby?
What a playful, stylish old guy you are!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Umm... Thanks for inviting me!
But, I'm with my companions right now, so I can't come along~

name: Y'golonac
text:
If you come to Kabukicho, I'll be your partner anytime.
Here's my business card~ Flick! Well, nice to meet you!

Waving his hand charmingly, Y'golonac quickly
caught up with [Player] and the others.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Whoa, that was a surprise.
Even without my hosting clothes, I'm still popular as ever.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Well... It's natural given my true charm.
Has the era finally caught up with me? Hihihi.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Wait―
Hmm??

There, his thick legs stopped suddenly.
Sensing some abnormality, he swept his gaze around.

name: Mafioso
text:
Oh, isn't that person over there super cute?
Heheh, should I try hitting on them!?

name: Specter
text:
No, that's not why we're here!
...But for some reason, I really want to talk to them.

name: Agent
text:
Argh, I love the atmosphere of this Fighting Festival!
My blood is boiling... I just want to go wild!!

name: Yatagarasu
text:
Hey, it's too early to let loose.
But this year there's the 'Tag Match', so the tension is up!

name: Yatagarasu
text:
Anyway―
Why did it suddenly get so hot...??

name: Y'golonac
text:
This... Could it be, that my influence
to stir up desires is increasing...?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Aha―!!
That's it!!

Suddenly, Y'golonac realized. A festival―
It's a place where desires easily go out of control.
Even more so in a place turned into an 'Otherworld'.

name: Y'golonac
text:
So, the reason Uncle could easily talk Jinn and Ryota
into it wasn't just my brilliant talking technique―

name: Y'golonac
text:
No, Uncle's talking technique is of course top-notch,
but maybe Uncle's power has a perfect affinity with this space...?

Having completely grasped the situation,
the evil Old One's mouth slowly and sloppily loosened.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Basically, it's just 'atmosphere-induced intoxication', right?
As long as I'm not making them go berserk with my 'mark',
and be careful not to cause a catastrophe like before...

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihihi. I'll make you realize how
dangerous the police is in no time, [Player]!!

name: Ryota
text:
Ah, Y'golonac-san, you caught up.
Was that an acquaintance you were talking to?

name: Jagannath
text:
They're probably customers of Tsukuyomi's shop, right?
Your retainers or priests, or whatever they are.

name: Y'golonac
text:
No, no, sorry, sorry. It's just that
Uncle's charm started leaking out a little, you know?

options.text: (Reach out your hand so he doesn't get lost)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sorry~
Hihihi, I just want to lick your hand when you're holding mine so tightly, [Player].

options.text: It's fine, let's just leave him behind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, you've been a bit cold to me lately.
It's like you're in your perpetual rebellious phase.

options.text: ...Are you making a more evil face than usual?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, [Player], even you're looking at me so passionately...
*blush*. How embarrassing.

name: Jagannath
text:
Now, now, we aren't here for play.
Now, which stall should I pull info from next... Heheh!

name: Ryota
text:
Ah, I'd like some roasted sweet potato~
Having lots of stalls unique to winter is fun, isn't it!

name: Jinn
text:
Wait, this is totally playing around!
Well, even a teacher can't help but... No, ahem.

name: Y'golonac
text:
(Hihihi, the cozy atmosphere ends here.
Uncle'll become the ruler of this festival right now!)

name: Y'golonac
text:
(Or should I be the 'Evil Santa in a Hurry'?
A Santa who fulfills all the desires swirling in the Fighting Festival, sort of?)

name: Y'golonac
text:
(Well then, let's start with the ones looking for a match.
Tune into their wicked desires and― Ta-da!!)

name: Luchador
text:
W-What...?
My feelings suddenly expanded...

name: Luchador
text:
―Umm! Would you like to have a (dating) match with me?
I fell in love with those selfishly cool eyebrows...!!

name: Jinn
text:
―!? No, I'm a teacher on patrol!
It's true that these eyebrows are my charm point, but...!

name: Female Student
text:
Hey, hey, want to look at the stalls with me?
You look like you eat a lot, so I'll treat you!

name: Ryota
text:
Eh, me!? But I'm with my friends...
Wait, don't push so hard―!?

name: Therian Student
text:
M-Mister Wild Black Tiger!
Umm... I love you!!

name: Jagannath
text:
Hmm? You've got quite the
guts to suddenly hit on me.

name: Therian Student
text:
I love guys with an aura of bravado!
Like delinquents, or martial artists!!

options.text: It suddenly turned into a hitting-on contest!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh my, what's going on!?
The Fighting Festival suddenly turned into an indecent festival!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Of course I'll guard you, [Player], but I might not be able to handle the rest!?

options.text: I know, right? Wild and bossy guys are great.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh? You feel that way too, [Player].
Then I'll work harder―
Wait, this isn't the time for that.

options.text: Why... is no one coming to me!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh my, what's going on!
The Fighting Festival suddenly turned into an indecent festival!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Of course I'll guard you, [Player], but I might not be able to handle the rest!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hmm, exactly! This is clearly a job for the police!
We have to do something about this moral decay!!

All around, hitting-on matches were breaking out regardless of location.
Given the type of crowd, no one was strongly refusing, but it was total chaos.

name: Y'golonac
text:
(Hihihi, it'll be a real pain to calm this down,
and they'll get fed up soon! ―Wait, hmm?)

name: Ganglie
text:
Oh, if it isn't you, [Player].
Don't tell me you're hitting on people at the Fighting Festival too?

name: Ganglie
text:
I understand, it's a stimulating festival.
Buhehe, how about we spend time together until the eve-festival?

name: Sanzo
text:
Whoa, just having 'fighting' in the name is
enough for me, so I usually stay away, but...

name: Sanzo
text:
Maybe it was good I came to see the eve-festival this year!?
Hey, you can hit on us too, you know?

note: in case you didn't get the reference, Power Rangers

options.text: Here come Flirter Red and Flirter Pink!
You guys aren't that different from usual!?
Save me! 'Anti-Flirt Squad'!

name: Ganglie
text:
No... Should the two of us just escape this commotion?
This festival makes people serious, you can't just be joking around.

name: Sanzo
text:
Why don't you come to dinner with my kid?
I've thought you were the one for a long time...!

options.text: Ah, maybe they are different from usual...
Ganglie's eyes and tone are serious!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ganglie
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What are you talking about?
I'm always serious when it comes to you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ganglie
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I was just embarrassed and covering it up, but...
Hey, be with me right now...!

options.text: Sanzo, is that a proposal...!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You can take it that way!
Think of becoming a step-parent of a single father as a teaching of the Buddha!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Daaaaaaaah! W-What are you
doing hitting on my [Player]!?

name: Ganglie
text:
Whoa, what are you doing, old man!?
Wait, hmm? Was I just in serious mode...?

name: Sanzo
text:
Ouch, First Precept: No Killing!
Even a single father deserves happiness...
Wait, what was I just saying!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hey you! Uncle's still basically your Papa,
so Uncle won't forgive you if you touch them in front of me~!

name: Ryota
text:
Huh... Did everyone calm down?
Whew, that was scary. But what was that just now?

name: Jinn
text:
That was strange. Students making fun of teachers is common,
but being approached so seriously... A-Am I going to be in trouble!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
(Haa, haa, I have to think about who I'm stirring up.
I could change the route... But what should I do?)

name: Y'golonac
text:
(―That's it! If they're betrayed by their respected senior,
they'll be traumatized and won't want to be a cop at all!)

name: Y'golonac
text:
(Jagannath isn't a pure and honest hero cop.
Let's stimulate his dark side and make him fall into darkness...!)

Y'golonac, who was muttering to himself,
slowly turned his face to Jagannath and grinned.

name: Jagannath
text:
Ah, seeing how things are, as I thought,
this is your doing, old man?

name: Jagannath
text:
Mostly, you're trying to cause trouble to discourage
[Player] from becoming a cop, or something like that.

options.text: I'm being underestimated quite a bit.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, I wasn't thinking anything like that!
Believe me, [Player]! (teary eyes)

options.text: He's cute when he's desperate.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Damn, like parent, like child?
You spoiling him like that is also something to consider.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Why not, it's fine!
We have a so-called sweet relationship!

options.text: Papa, were you thinking that...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, I wasn't thinking anything like that!
Believe me, [Player]! (teary eyes)

name: Jagannath
text:
Yeah, right. And I can guess what you're planning next too.
You're trying to use me, right?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Gasp! I-It's nothing like that?
Uncle's not thinking about any of that?

name: Jagannath
text:
Huuuuuh, is that so?
I thought it'd be something like this, though?

Immediately, Jagannath's 'bad brat' switch was turned on.
His glittering smile and gaze caught [Player]―

name: Jagannath
text:
Hey you, what the hell are you staring at!?
Trying to pick a fight, huh!?

name: Jagannath
text:
Fine, if that's how you want it,
let's go one-on-one... Wait, oh?

name: Jagannath
text:
What, now that I've got a good look at you, you've got a cute face.
I've taken a liking to you. If I win, you'll become mine!!

options.text: Picking a fight and hitting on me at the same time!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wait, wait, wait!!
Stop making eyes at [Player]!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Uncle was trying to egg you on, but this is a different direction!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, it's fine.
For some reason, I feel like I've returned to my delinquent days!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Whoa!? Don't tell me my presence has already stimulated his mischievous desires...!?

options.text: You don't have to do that...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wait, wait, wait!!
Stop making eyes at [Player]!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Uncle was trying to egg you on, but this is a different direction!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, it's fine.
For some reason, I feel like I've returned to my delinquent days!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Whoa!? Don't tell me my presence has already stimulated his mischievous desires...!?

options.text: (Join in the play in high spirits)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, your mischievousness is also quite something.
As I thought, you're my partner―
Wait, is this not acting anymore?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wait, wait, wait!!
Uncle won't allow that dangerous distance!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Uncle was trying to egg you on, but this is a different direction!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: On top of that, you're inviting them into the police in the confusion!?

text:
While Y'golonac panicked in frustration,
Jagannath's mischief only continued to intensify.

name: Jagannath
text:
Alright, I've decided, [Player].
I'll land a one-two-Jagan on your heart!

name: Jagannath
text:
Be my right hand, my right lung, my other half.
Life is all about what happens inside the fighting ring.

He pulled [Player] close, their faces nearly touching.
His bright eyes were burning with intensity.

options.text: That's definitely too close!
Wait, it's just acting... Right!?
(Leave it to the flow)

name: Y'golonac
text:
Y-You!!!!
That's not allowed, that's the most forbidden development ever!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
I have to stop it even by force― But it's impossible for me alone
to stop a mixed martial artist like Jagan!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
But a guy in bad-boy mode won't stop himself...
Ahh, what should I do? What now...!?

Y'golonac's panic swelled at the sight.
And― it was an intense panic, even more than he himself realized.

To the extent that he momentarily forgot the casual 'old man' persona
he had been asked to adopt since coming to Tokyo―

name: Y'golonac
text:
...I will never forgive you.
If you think you can steal a priest from this Y'golonac...

Next moment, a scene that would shave away
one's sanity unfolded before [Player] and the others.

Jagannath had unintentionally
pressed another switch.

name: Ryota
text:
...?
Y'golonac... san??

Huge mouths that normally appear on his palms when using his 'Sacred Artifact'
began to manifest one after another around Y'golonac.

If one were to describe it, it was the manifestation of a ruler―
The return of ■■■■■■, the Master of Vice and Desire who rules over all.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Hey, is the old man in acting mode too?
Wait, there's no way...

Y'golonac remained silent.
He didn't even seem to notice the ominous giant hands floating around him.

And, as if reflecting their master's will,
they began to move on their own like living creatures―

name: Yatagarasu
text:
Ouch! A sharp pain in my back...
Wait, what is this feeling...!?

name: Agent
text:
My blood is boiling more and more... It's burning!
Damn, I really want to go wild now!!

name: Yatagarasu
text:
Me too! Hey― Want to pick a fight with me right now?
I have to release this feeling!

The surroundings instantly turned into a literal 'Fighting Festival',
and a hellish scene of delinquents happily clashing fists spread out.

name: Jinn
text:
W-What's happening?
Isn't real fighting forbidden in this festival!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Mine.
The reason why I came to this Tokyo.

options.text: Is Y'golonac going berserk...?
His 'Sacred Artifact' is activating unconsciously...!?
Banishment spell, go!!

dialogue_after_selection.text: Those abyss-like eyes that didn't reflect any light sent a cold gaze toward [Player].

name: Jagannath
text:
Oh crap...
Did I egg Y'golonac on too much with my bad-boy act!?

name: Jagannath
text:
This is bad...
Hey, get a hold of yourself―!!!

Weaving through the many palms with a shadow step,
Jagannath's right fist plowed into Y'golonac's stomach.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Guh-ack!!? *wheeze*...
W-What are you doing all of a sudden, Jagan―

name: Y'golonac
text:
―Wait, huh!? What, what's going on?
U-Uncle definitely wasn't using his 'Sacred Artifact', okay!?

options.text: As expected of physical force, it solves everything.
...You're getting a punishment later.
The people around us haven't come back to their senses!?

name: Jagannath
text:
The old man is back to his senses, but the influence isn't fading...
Gah, I reap what I sow, huh? Can't be helped!

name: Jagannath
text:
Maintaining public order and fighting are both my specialty.
I'll settle this quickly before the fuss gets any bigger!

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, I can't exactly say I'm enjoying this, but―
It might be a good chance to see your growth, [Player]?

options.text: No, it's obvious you're enjoying this.
Will they come back if I punch them all?
(Stand back-to-back and take a stance)

name: Y'golonac
text:
Wait, I don't know why but this has turned into a hot-blooded development?
The kind where the bond between buddies definitely deepens! Why!?

name: Jagannath
text:
Alright! Anyone who wants to rampage, come at us all at once!
Your nemesis, the police duo, will take you on!

name: Jagannath
text:
A battle with the lovable delinquents of our beloved Fighting Festival...
Now, let's give them a spectacular scene, my partner!!

name: Jagannath
text:
What's wrong, what's wrong!? Punches that light won't do a damn
thing against this active-duty police fighter, y'know!?

The police duo continues to land precise counters on the
swarm of yankee customers attacking from all directions.

However, the berserk yankees still won't stop, and there is
no sign of the brawls breaking out everywhere subsiding at all.

name: Ryota
text:
Hey, Y'golonac-san, you're the one who caused this, right?
If you don't return everyone to normal, this won't ever end...!

name: Jinn
text:
Or rather, I think this counts as a real 'dangerous situation' already!?
Come on, hurry up and wake those guys up―!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Eeeh, even if you say that, it was unconscious just now.
And besides, the 'Rule' of this 'Sacred Artifact' on Uncle's palms is―

Almost at the same time as Y'golonac showed both hands to explain,
a rampaging yankee collided with his back.

As a result, his huge body lost its
balance significantly, he staggered, and then―

name: Y'golonac
text:
―Wait,
nooo!!?

name: Jinn & Ryota
text: Uwaaaaaaah!?

Jinn and Ryota fell down as they were pushed over.
In short― They came into contact with Y'golonac's hands.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...You're kidding, right?
Don't tell me I just gave 'em a bite...?

name: Jinn
text:
Ow ow, my right shoulder... Wait, what's this!?
My desire to serve as a smoke genie is swelling up...!

name: Jinn
text:
I want to lend my strength to students― To students in trouble!! Uoooh!
Is there anyone among you who wants to borrow my strength!?

name: Ryota
text:
I-I'm so sorry, [Player]~~~!!
It's all because I wanted to hold you back!

name: Ryota
text:
But, I still can't do bad things after all,
and I can't bind your freedom either~~~!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
That's not it, I didn't mean for this to happen!
Uuuh, Jinn-chan, Ryota. I'm really sorry...

name: Y'golonac
text:
But, even though they're ruled by Uncle's power, instead of falling
into darkness, they're becoming super good kids!? What's going on!?

The hot-blooded teacher rushes toward the wild yankees raising a cloud of dust,
and Ryota clings to [Player] in the middle of the battle.

options.text: What happened so suddenly!?
What you're saying and doing are different!?
(Pat his head)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'm really sorry, but for me, meeting you, Toji and the others was the greatest treasure of my life...

text:
[Player] is unable to move as they are hugged by Ryota.
In that opening, one of the yankees launched a surprise attack from behind.

name: Therian Student
text:
Super Chaaaaance!
Your back is wide open~!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
―!! No way!
I won't let youuuu!!

Faster than the unleashed fist, Y'golonac cut in between.
He used his body as a shield to wrap around and protect [Player].

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hey you! What do you think
you're doing to Uncle's cute [Player]!

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Though, if you trace it back,
it's aaaaall Uncle's own fault...

name: Y'golonac
text:
Even so, what I can't forgive, I won't forgive!
Match-Pump Puuuuunch!!

match-pump: person who starts a fire (match)
and then puts it out (pump) to look like a hero

options.text: My heart might have skipped a beat just now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh!? Really!? Gwahahaha...
That's exactly how I planned it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You got a loose screw or something!?
Hurry up and do something, I can't punch these normally good citizens for real!

options.text: There's no way a special move's name is that terrible!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You got a loose screw or something!?
Hurry up and do something, I can't punch these normally good citizens for real!

options.text: Anyway, let's get through this!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Even if you say that, Uncle's 'Rule' can't be canceled freely,
and Uncle's power is boosted by the energy of this place...

name: Y'golonac
text:
Aaaah―! Please, someone come―!
Wash away Uncle's sinful blunder―!!

And, almost at the same time as Y'golonac gave a soul-felt cry,
the most suitable person happened to pass by with almost miraculous timing.

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Oh no~! My part-time job ran long.
At this rate, I'll be late for my meeting with Motosumi and the others―

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Wait, whoaaa!?
W-What's going on around here...!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
―!!!!
S-Sarutahiko-chwaaaaan!!

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Y-Y'golonac! Why are you here?
Are you doing host solicitation again?

Sarutahiko remembers the time when
they worked together as bubbly hosts.

name: Y'golonac
text:
For you to come to a place like this is a godsend...
No, it's like a luxury cruiser appearing in the middle of the sea...!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
You know, Sarutahiko.
*sniff* Uncle... Uncle...!!

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Wait, this nasty feeling spreading through the venue...
Did you mess up agaaaain!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
That's how it is, but this time Uncle really,
truly doesn't know what happened...!

Sarutahiko scratches the back of his head, grasping the general situation from
the unique mood of the place and Y'golonac's genuinely teary eyes.

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Ah, so you got hit by the 'Power of the Place', huh?
It looks like it would fit perfectly with your style, after all...

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Well, it can't be helped since
it turned out like this. Alright then―

name: Sarutahiko
text:
I'll rinse away your swollen 'desires'!
「Restless Mind Monkey」! Sarutabiko no Aramitama!!

The massive amount of bubbles gushing from his shell 'Sacred Artifact'
covered the entire area in no time, and then―

name: Ryota
text:
...Ah, [Player]?
I felt so lonely all of a sudden for some reason...

name: Jinn
text:
―Huh? Was I...
Swallowed by my desires completely?

name: Male Student
text:
Hey, you, teacher over there― No, Master.
Your passionate words and fists of love resonated with our souls...

name: Jinn
text:
No, that was... My desire to serve as a genie just
went out of control because of Y'golonac's 'Rule'...

He unconsciously put his hand on his washed right shoulder.
A slight throbbing sensation and a strange feeling remained.

name: Jinn
text:
...?? Is it just my imagination?
There's still something like a slight fever...

name: Therian Student
text:
Phew, you're quite something yourself―
That battle with you guys was super refreshing too, thanks.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, I felt like I went back to my delinquent days too, so it wasn't too bad?
I don't mind helping you hot-headed people blow off a little steam.

name: Jagannath
text:
But if you cause a fuss here, the important
festival might get ruined, so do keep it moderate...

name: Jagannath
text:
―Though, you guys aren't responsible this time.
As for the start of the incident―

name: Y'golonac
text: ―Yikes!!

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Yeah, there might be room for extenuating circumstances,
but as for the point that you, with a 'criminal record',
messed up again―

name: Y'golonac
text:
―Yikes!!
Yiiiiiiikes!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Ah, that's... not it.
What's not it is, umm...

His eyes, which were swimming around pathetically, suddenly became fixed.
Thinking he had no choice, Y'golonac performed a vigorous 'dogeza' grovel.

name: Y'golonac
text:
No, nothing is different!
This was brought about by Uncle's immaturity, sorry!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Sarutahiko, I'll pay back this debt many times over.
Uncle will do anything he can do.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Jagannath, I'm truly sorry for trying to play a trick on you.
I panicked from pathetic jealousy and did something stupid~!

Jagannath and the others unconsciously looked at
each other at the sight of the spectacular prostration.

name: Jagannath
text:
...My bad-boy act got you acting wild,
so half the responsibility is on my side too.
Raise your head, old man.

He didn't move immediately, but slowly raised his forehead.
His eyebrows, which are usually powerful, were drooped in a sad shape.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Jinn, Ryota, I have to apologize to you guys too.
It's not like I did it on purpose, but that's no excuse either...

name: Y'golonac
text:
And after that, of course... Wait, that's it!!
You aren't injured from that just now, right [Player]!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
What, nothing in particular? But, just in case,
wouldn't it be better to have you checked at the medical tent or something?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Alright, then Uncle will run and
become a taxi for you. Alright, here goes!!

As soon as he finished speaking,
Y'golonac picked up [Player] and ran off like a rabbit.

options.text: Hold on!?
Heyyyyyyyyyyyy!?
(Hold on to Y'golonac)

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, as I thought, he's never short on attention when it comes to [Player]!
Well, I'll forgive him for today though!

Jagannath, waving as he laughs heartily, sends a side-glance
to the young man next to him once the two are out of sight.

name: Jagannath
text:
...So, let's leave the job of squeezing the old man dry to [Player],
shall we, Sarutahiko of Macaque's Pond?

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Huh? Why does another region's yankee know about me...
No, I get it. The 'Umamichi' bunch were talking about a yankee-like cop...!

name: Ryota
text:
Could it be, Jagannath-san is studious?
Or rather, does he just simply like yankees?

name: Jinn
text:
Still, if the guardian is like that, [Player] has it hard too.
I fully understand what they meant by 'overprotective' now...

The suddenly spread atmosphere of relaxation was broken a
moment later by the notification sound of Jagannath's device.

name: Jagannath
text:
―Hm? It's Hogen the geezer again.
'Contact headquarters immediately'?

name: Jagannath
text:
Tch, someone must have reported this fuss. I guess I've
got no choice. I'll have to find a way to smooth things over...

After softly putting [Player] down in a place with no people around,
Y'golonac turned around and crouched down.

He hugged his knees, shrunk his
bull neck and stopped like a sulking toddler.

options.text: (Gently pat his head)
(Crouch down next to him and look at his face)
Our parent-child relationship is gonna reverse, you know?

name: Y'golonac
text:
...[Player], I'm sorry for before.
I didn't mean to put you in a truly dangerous situation.

name: Y'golonac
text:
But, you know. If you join the police, something big will happen someday,
and Uncle won't always be able to protect you by your side!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
―I just wanted to convey that so badly that I became desperate.
It was a complete failure, though.

options.text: You're powerful, so you have to be careful.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uuuuh... You're right.
Even though Uncle has troubled you many times, he is still such a bad boy!

options.text: I'm sure everyone doesn't mind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You are...?
[Player], are you not angry anymore...?
When he peeked at [Player]'s face fearfully like a child afraid of being scolded, he showed a look of relief.

options.text: I don't want to arrest you, Y'golonac.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
U-Uncle doesn't want to be caught either!
...Wait, that tone means...!
The panicked Y'golonac immediately understood he had been teased by [Player], he pouted.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...To tell the truth, I wasn't just hit by
the police transfer, but by Ryota's words too―
'When things won't stay this way forever'.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Both the school and the house you grow up
in are places you'll eventually leave, right?
If so, either way, you'll leave Uncle.

name: Y'golonac
text:
I absolutely hate that, I really hate it.
...But if that's the case, what can I even do?

name: Y'golonac
text:
[Player], Uncle just simply wants
to be with you forever, you know...

options.text: What should I do now?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Uncle has no idea at all.
I just want this 'now' to continue forever.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm scared that our relationship will change, and even more scared of leaving without being able to change it.
So I'm stuck, maybe even worse than when I was trapped in bricks.

options.text: Well then, shall we be hosts together?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That... you'd get all kinds of weird bugs on you!!
If Uncle had to let you do that, Uncle would support you for the rest of your life―

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wait, that's ignoring your will again.
No, instead of that...
I want us to think about it together, if possible.

options.text: I guess it's about time for you to leave the nest.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I know that so well I could cry.
But, there seem to be all kinds of routes for leaving the nest, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: The route Uncle wants to choose is the one where we can stay together, I don't know which route it is, or even if such a thing exists...

text:
Something has to change― I know that much myself.
But, I don't know how to change, nor can I face the fear that something can change.

This was the conclusion Y'golonac reached after speaking
haltingly like a child. Meaning, he had no idea what to do.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Anyway, is it time to leave the nest already?
No matter what form we choose, is that the only absolute thing?

He stands up, sniffs with a tearful voice, and looks at the evening sky.
After rubbing the inner corners of his eyes vigorously, he turns back to [Player].

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hey, [Player]. Umm...
Could you let me spoil you just for a little while?

name: Y'golonac
text:
I understand if you'd like to tell me
that it's a bit rich to ask after that mess!

name: Y'golonac
text:
But... If it's the time for Uncle to work hard on leaving the nest,
then isn't it also the time for you to start practicing filial piety, [Player]!?

options.text: Alright, I'll spoil you rotten!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
R-Really? Then, I'll take up some of your time, okay?
I feel guilty, but... I'm so happy!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Guhihi, actually Uncle has a place I've wanted to go with you, [Player]!!

options.text: In the end, you're fine with staying as foster parent and child?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
―Ugh! Well...
We don't have to reach a conclusion right now, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Besides, it's a fact that right now we're half parent-child and half 'something more'.
Anyway... there's a place I reaaaally want you to go with me!!

options.text: (Look like you're troubled)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It breaks my heart when you make that face.
Yet, I also feel like I want to see that face forever...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haaah, Uncle doesn't understand himself.
But, I do know my wish for this moment!!

text:
Following him in response to his request,
the place Y'golonac led to was an unexpected one. It was―

name: Y'golonac
text:
Phew!! Winter hot springs really bring you back to life!
Hihihi, can you believe there are even 'hot spring stalls' at the Fighting Festival!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Apparently, we're being graciously allowed to
use the 'Youkai Hot Springs at the Youkai Temple'.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Since it's a festival hot spring, I guess it's meant for 'purification' too.
Wait, if Uncle is purified, won't Uncle dissolve and disappear!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
It's almost time for the eve-festival, so no one will come,
but just in case, your generous Uncle made this a private reservation~!!

The feeling of overcompensating from the guilt of making Player follow his selfishness.
Having realized that, Y'golonac immediately became discouraged.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Today, from the moment I met you,
I wanted to be alone with you even for a second.

name: Y'golonac
text:
There was the anxiety about the police transfer, but it was too crowded
to talk properly, and then Jagannath, *sniff*, teased Uncle...

name: Y'golonac
text:
I don't want to admit it, but I know Jagannath's charm really well.
Uncle only has 'Bad', but as for him...

name: Y'golonac
text:
What is it with him, having a character like
'Both Side A and Side B are the best', that's just way too unfair...

options.text: You are charming too, Y'golonac.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Did you really mean that?
I'm used to being told that by my babies, and I kind of think so myself, but―

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
For some reason, I get anxious in front of you.
So... It makes me feel a bit relieved to hear that.
With a simple voice, Y'golonac pours out his honest feelings. Seeing his defenseless state, [Player]―

options.text: The festival attire suited you the best.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
R-Right!?
After all, festival attire belongs to stylish old men!
It has a certain class that youngsters can't bring out, hihihi.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: I was praised for my headband and hairstyle by my babies, but being praised by you makes me the happiest~
With an innocent voice, Y'golonac pours out his honest feelings. Seeing his defenseless state, [Player]―

options.text: Don't sulk so easily!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, Uncle doesn't want to get sulky either!
But... when you're involved, I just can't help it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
All my composure as a popular old man just blows away.
If you disappear... Uncle will be lonely.
With a simple voice, Y'golonac pours out his honest feelings. Seeing his defenseless state, [Player]―

options.text: I'll wash your back.
Come over here, customer!
(Silently pull Y'golonac's hand)

text:
As they washed his large back, Y'golonac was momentarily
surprised, but showed a look of joy shortly after.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Eh, what's wrong? You're being super kind all of a sudden...
Did you perhaps fall for Uncle's unexpected fragility?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihihi. Talk about not having any water between us, even though we are surrounded by it.
Phew, I'm glad I got the courage to ask for being spoiled.

Y'golonac was dancing with joy, but soon a hint
of melancholy seeped into his shoulders.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Uncle sometimes has a thought.
Would it have been simpler if we had met in a different way?

name: Y'golonac
text:
But, I immediately get horrified of that thought.
Because then, my current relationship and memories with you wouldn't exist, [Player].

name: Y'golonac
text:
We might drift apart because of this 'too-close relationship',
but that's why Uncle doesn't want to imagine a relationship that isn't like this.

name: Y'golonac
text:
You might not understand what I'm talking about,
and I don't know what kind of relationship would be satisfying, but...

options.text: Do we graduate from being pseudo-parent and child?

dialogue_after_selection.text: Y'golonac jumped, and then slowly looked up at the midwinter night sky.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I wonder if such a thing is possible?
Can we become a new relationship that is neither parent-child nor strangers from now on?

The question he asked himself contained an elusive anxiety.
However, the warm hand touching his back softly melted it away.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
―But, as you've known.
Our relationship was already super irregular from the very beginning.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Then― Maybe we can become anything?
Maybe we can value the future just as much as the past...

A long, long silence passed by.
And then, Y'golonac added softly, with a look that said 'I have to at least say this'.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Hey, no matter what kind of relationship it becomes, Uncle will always cherish you, [Player].

options.text: Let's slowly find a new relationship together.

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hearing those words, Y'golonac turned his entire body around.
He widened his eyes and stared intently at [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Does that mean...
You'll think about it with Uncle?
So, a different future with your Uncle from now...?

Y'golonac understood immediately from [Player]'s expression.
The thrill that soaked into his body was just about to turn into action, but he firmly restrained himself.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
―Noo!
I almost gave you a huge hug while covered in bubbles.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But... There's no night as happy as this one.
If we can worry about our futures together, then I'm not alone.

Y'golonac fell silent, pondering on something on his own.
Then― he added in his most defenseless tone of the day.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, this much is plenty obvious, but can I tell you something?
Uncle cherishes you more than anyone, more than anything, [Player]...

options.text: Even with our current relationship, our hearts won't drift apart.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You're right.
Even if something changes as we move into a new environment, our relationship itself won't just disappear.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Even if we end up living apart, the distance between our hearts won't drift apart―
I guess that's how it is.
He softly looked up at the winter night sky, pondering on [Player]'s words, and his own.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Things that change, and things that will absolutely never change. It's lonely, but we have to value all of it together, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Uncle is truly sorry for being such a troublesome geezer.
But, Uncle cherishes you more than anything, [Player]...

text:
Meanwhile, Jagannath left the bustle of the
venue and reported back to his superior, Hogen.

name: Jagannath
text:
―So, it's true that there was a bit of trouble, but with the cooperation
of the citizens, the situation was immediately brought under control.

name: Jagannath
text:
Please continue to hold off our headquarters from intervening
and leave the scene to me. Old man, I'm only saying this because it's you―

name: Jagannath
text:
It seems this festival is going to be quite
important for those delinquent brats and their leader.

name: Hogen
text:
Well, I mostly intended for
that when I paired you with [Player].

name: Hogen
text:
However, since there were reports of a brawl,
we cannot afford not to strengthen security on our side.

name: Hogen
text:
Shall we send a few police officers to save face?
Well, sending the few Tenjin of 'your faction'
would make for a good harmony of Yin and Yang.

name: Jagannath
text:
...I guess I can deal with that much.
Seriously, thanks, old man.

name: Hogen
text:
Hoho, can't you at least be respectful when you're saying thanks?
Well, fine. I'll continue to leave it to you, Jagannath.

After finishing the conversation, Hogen looks out the
window alone at the cold Tokyo night view and narrows his eyes.

name: Hogen
text:
Now, what shall we do?
As for that incident, I'll entrust it to Jagannath as is―

name: Hogen
text:
A police matter occurred at a festival where the police shouldn't
intervene, and a rift appeared. In a festival where that man―
The general leader of 'Umamichi' is participating.

name: Hogen
text:
It was a cycle of the stars that we wouldn't face each other directly, but...
Hmmm, maybe it's 'finally' time this time around?

Furthermore, at the same time, at a rehearsal for a certain show.
An extremely unexpected sight was unfolding on that ring.

Sanat Kumara collapsed, drenched in sweat.
From above, looking down on him is―

name: Baphomet
text:
Oh, what seems to be the matter?
I still have not done 'almost anything' yet, though...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
―Ugh!
This serious match...

name: Sanat Kumara
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">I admit... my defeat............!!
